description.value: By drawing upon the First World's magic, you can siphon a portion of that malleable world to create a convincing illusion. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Disguise]{Illusory Disguise}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item Facade]{Item Facade}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ventriloquism]{Ventriloquism}. At 7th level, the spell is heightened to 2nd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened an additional spell level.
